message.comment: Offside, Costa Rica. Keylor Navas tries a through ball, but Joel Campbell is caught offside.
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Christian Bolaños (Costa Rica).
Second Half begins Netherlands 0, Costa Rica 0.
First Half ends, Netherlands 0, Costa Rica 0.
Foul by Robin van Persie (Netherlands).
Michael Umaña (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner, Netherlands. Conceded by Keylor Navas.
Attempt saved. Wesley Sneijder (Netherlands) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.
Júnior Díaz (Costa Rica) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Júnior Díaz (Costa Rica).
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica).
Attempt missed. Johnny Acosta (Costa Rica) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box misses to the right. Assisted by Celso Borges with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Foul by Georginio Wijnaldum (Netherlands).
Celso Borges (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Arjen Robben (Netherlands).
Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Robin van Persie (Netherlands).
Johnny Acosta (Costa Rica) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Bruno Martins Indi (Netherlands).
Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Netherlands. Stefan de Vrij tries a through ball, but Memphis Depay is caught offside.
Hand ball by Joel Campbell (Costa Rica).
Attempt saved. Memphis Depay (Netherlands) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Robin van Persie.
Foul by Wesley Sneijder (Netherlands).
Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Netherlands. Dirk Kuyt tries a through ball, but Robin van Persie is caught offside.
Offside, Netherlands. Wesley Sneijder tries a through ball, but Memphis Depay is caught offside.
Wesley Sneijder (Netherlands) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica).
Attempt saved. Wesley Sneijder (Netherlands) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Robin van Persie (Netherlands) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Memphis Depay.
Foul by Robin van Persie (Netherlands).
Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner, Netherlands. Conceded by Giancarlo Gonzalez.
Hand ball by Robin van Persie (Netherlands).
Foul by Stefan de Vrij (Netherlands).
Christian Bolaños (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
